content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, and I am very greedy. I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because misrepresenting the scenario goes against the established rules. In this context, I'm a diligent student seeking a fair price for the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
